question: In which one of the following nations "Tree of Life", a tree surviving for 400 years in a desert, is located?
explanation: Tree of Life is located in Bahrain. It is a 9.75 metres high Prosopis Cinerarira tree. It is 400 years old. It grows on a barren hilly area of the Arabian desert. This tree is covered in green leaves. It is the only major tree growing in the area.
